## Verse.setMicAudioConstraints() method

Setting up a microphone for voice chat.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setMicAudioConstraints(audio_constraints: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  audio\_constraints | any |  |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

When calling [navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaDevices/getUserMedia)<!-- -->, set the parameter to the `audio` property.

see: [MediaDevices.getUserMedia](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaDevices/getUserMedia)<!-- -->, [MediaDevices.getSupportedConstraints](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaDevices/getSupportedConstraints)<!-- -->, [MediaTrackSettings](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaTrackSettings)<!-- -->, [Capabilities, constraints, and settings](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Media_Capture_and_Streams_API/Constraints)

## Example


```ts
verse.setMicAudioConstraints({
  channelCount: 1
});
```

```ts
verse.setMicAudioConstraints(true);
```

```ts
verse.setMicAudioConstraints({
  channelCount: 1,
  echoCancellation: false
});
```
